Class GPUThread

  • java.lang.Object

        • ca.nengo.util.impl.GPUThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GPUThread
extends NodeThread
    A thread which uses an NEFGPUInterface to run GPU nodes and projections.
